A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
i guess at some point you just grow out of stuff. TLJ is one of those series killers that you hear about but you vaguely remember. But\, i doubt any fan of the Empire that Lucas had created will give much sympathy to a BIG FAT rat whether it works for Disney or not. Because no matter how great one believes Disney to be. Star Wars was seen as something other. Something outside the norm. it wasn't even commercial. it was unique. 

I can't even force myself to plunge into spoilers. But for most of us who know the term "passing the torch\," it was all but certain that this was really what this was all about. And to that end it is the end of an era and an icon. And with that i give this waste of human disgrace 1.5 out of 5
unworthy...
